tagline: We love to do the things that are stuff.
footerText: eComm Company is a FCA regulated company with a load of text at the bottom telling you things that you may need to know if you're a journalist or regulator. Since 2018 eComm company has been selling things and stuff to people who are invested in the T&S Markets and has flexed-out to other markets wherein FCA regulations may or may not apply. For more information about T&S Markets, please visit https://thingsandstuff.net/regulations or get in touch via the contact us page.
